Techno-Oligarch Awards.name: Techno-Oligarch Awards
Techno-Oligarch Awards.description: Each lottery ticket gives you one vote in the election to replace Vitalik as Zuzalu's beloved dictator. Join the fun and have a say in the future leadership!

Longevity State dot Japan.name: Longevity State dot Japan
Longevity State dot Japan.description: Participate in the Longevity State dot Japan lottery and stand a chance to win exciting prizes while supporting longevity research and initiatives.

ZuVillage Georgia 2025.name: ZuVillage Georgia 2025
ZuVillage Georgia 2025.description: Join the ZuVillage Georgia 2025 lottery for a chance to win amazing prizes and support the development of the ZuVillage community in Batumi, Georgia.
